Description: The funeral is taking place at Kibbutz Kissufim, of which Mantzur was one of the founding members. During his eulogy, Israeli President Isaac Herzog called again for a state commission of inquiry to investigate the events of Oct. 7

Title: Hundreds accompany coffin of hostage Shlomo Mantzur to his burial...
Description: The convoy carrying the coffin of Shlomo Mantzur, whose body was only returned to Israel last week, left from Tel Aviv's outskirts on Sunday morning on its way to Kibbutz Kissufim, where he lived and where he will be buried Sunday afternoon

Title: Freed Israeli hostage Eli Sharabi and others to meet Trump in Was...

Title: On October 7, Israel's navy was only ready for a limited attack, ...
Description: Early that morning, a nearby naval base was told not to move its forces, an attempt to protect intelligence sources. Sixteen of 38 Hamas terrorists on boats entered Israel and killed 17 civilians

Title: BBC apologizes for Gaza documentary narrated by teenage son of Ha...
Description: The company that produced the documentary 'Gaza: How to Survive a War Zone' did not inform the BBC that the boy in the film is the son of a senior Hamas official who was paid for his participation. The BBC announced that the film will not be aired again

Title: The IDF's landmark Oct. 7 probes reveal only part of Israel's fai...
Description: The October 7 disaster wasn't just the result of mistaken decisions that night, but stemmed from years of failures. Chief among them: the political conception of Hamas as an Israeli asset, the intelligence misjudgment that it couldn't launch a large-scale attack, and weak defensive deployment

Title: Netanyahu stalls Stage 2 of the Gaza cease-fire and once again we...
Description: The inertia of Stage 1 and the resultant dramatic change in the Israeli public's mood will soon clash with the prime minister's plan to obfuscate and prevaricate ■ The government's sadistic abuse of kibbutzniks knows no bounds ■ And who could ask the High Court of Justice for succor?

Title: Up to his old tricks: Netanyahu weaponizes grief and puts Stage 2...
Description: The inertia of Stage 1 and the resultant dramatic change in the Israeli public's mood will soon clash with the prime minister's plan to obfuscate and prevaricate ■ The government's sadistic abuse of kibbutzniks knows no bounds ■ And who could ask the High Court of Justice for succor?

Title: Netanyahu to consult with Gaza cease-fire negotiating team Friday...
Description: ISRAEL: Ahead of Ramadan on Saturday, Hamas calls on Palestinians 'to come to Al-Aqsa in large numbers' ■ GAZA CEASE-FIRE: Israel reportedly asks for six-week Stage 1 extension, Hamas rejects; Talks to continue Saturday ■ LEBANON: Katz says U.S. agreed for IDF to occupy buffer zone indefinitely; Lebanon's new PM calls for 'full Israeli withdrawal'

Title: No more hostage releases under Gaza cease-fire until Israel agree...
Description: ISRAEL: Shin Bet, police to investigate connection between PMO and Qatar, AG's Office says; IDF publishes Oct. 7 probes, finds systemic failures ■ GAZA CEASE-FIRE: Israel reportedly asks for six-week Stage 1 extension, Hamas rejects; Four bodies of Israeli hostages returned by Hamas as Palestinian prisoners released ■ LEBANON: Katz says U.S. agreed for IDF to occupy buffer zone indefinitely; IDF says it killed Hezbollah operative in south Lebanon drone strike

Title: Israel reportedly wants to extend first stage of Gaza truce by si...
Description: ISRAEL: Shin Bet, police to investigate connection between PMO and Qatar, AG's Office says; IDF publishes Oct. 7 probes, finds systemic failures ■ GAZA CEASE-FIRE: Four bodies of Israeli hostages returned by Hamas as Palestinian prisoners are released ■ LEBANON: Katz says U.S. agreed for IDF to occupy buffer zone indefinitely; IDF says it killed Hezbollah operative in south Lebanon drone strike

Title: IDF says it killed Hezbollah operative in south Lebanon drone str...
Description: ISRAEL: Shin Bet, police to investigate connection between PMO and Qatar, AG's Office says ■ GAZA CEASE-FIRE: Four bodies of Israeli hostages returned by Hamas as Palestinian prisoners are released ■ LEBANON: IDF says it struck Hezbollah arms operative near Lebanon-Syria border, accusing him of 'violating cease-fire'

Title: Far-right minister Ben-Gvir calls for the transfer of Palestinian...
Description: ISRAEL: Shin Bet, police to investigate connection between PMO and Qatar, AG's Office says ■ GAZA CEASE-FIRE: Four bodies of Israeli hostages returned by Hamas as Palestinian prisoners are released ■ LEBANON: IDF says it struck Hezbollah arms operative near Lebanon-Syria border, accusing him of 'violating cease-fire'

Title: IDF probe into Oct. 7 finds Southern Command dismissed Hamas inva...
Description: Investigations into Oct. 7 found that IDF commanders were unaware of battle locations and that troops were sent to cities instead of Gaza border communities. The Gaza Division also lacked intel for hours, yet its commander refused to report defeat

Title: IDF probe: Southern Command didn't think Hamas would invade, Gaza...
Description: Investigation into October 7 massacre found that commanders did not know what was happening or where battles were taking place - and troops were dispatched to the cities. Moreover, the Gaza Division couldn't provide intel for hours, but its commander refused to report it was defeated

Title: Years of Israeli misconceptions, intelligence blunders led to Oct...
Description: Israeli perceptions were deeply rooted – and no effort was made to challenge them': Investigations into Israel's threat assessments of Gaza and the intelligence community's performance reveal a series of political and military failures that resulted in the October 7 massacre

Title: IDF probe: Military Intelligence misread Hamas intentions, failed...
Description: Investigations into Israel's perception of the threat from Gaza and the performance of the intelligence community indicate that the October 7 massacre was preceded by a series of failures at the political and military levels. 'Israeli perceptions were deeply rooted – and no effort was made to challenge them'

Title: Israeli Air Force's attention was focused on Lebanon as Hamas inv...
Description: The air force probe repeats the central line of defense – that top air force officials were not included in the late night consultations concerning suspicious activity in Gaza and therefore, the force did not prepare as needed

Title: Israeli negotiators aim to bring quick release of more living hos...
Description: The Israeli delegation left for Cairo Thursday night for talks that are officially about the second stage of the cease-fire deal but in practice are mainly a continuation of the first stage

Title: Israeli army misunderstood warning signs on night before Oct. 7 a...
Description: While concerning signs emerged the night before Hamas launched its assault, the military assumed it was a drill and failed to grasp the urgency

Title: Israel's government wants a monopoly on cruelty to the hostages a...
Description: When an arm of Israel's government locks up a comedian for jokes about hostages, it is telling its citizens with chilling clarity that only we, lords of the land, are allowed to laugh at the hostages – and that we alone have the power to defile the dignity of the dead when it serves our interests

Title: Far-right rally calls for Israeli resettlement of Gaza, Palestini...
Description: There is no other solution to terrorism, only sovereignty and inheriting the land, in Gaza, Jenin and Tul Karm,' an Israeli minister told the crowd

Title: Shin Bet, police to investigate connection between PMO and Qatar,...
Description: The decision was taken after a discussion between the Attorney General, State Attorney, senior police, and Shin Bet personnel, following Haaretz's report that two of his senior aides built a campaign to improve the image of Qatar, which has no diplomatic relations with Israel

Title: ADL head Jonathan Greenblatt: 'I should have framed my reaction t...

Description: Hamas released the bodies of Itzik Elgarat, Tsachi Idan, Ohad Yahalomi and Shlomo Mantzur overnight into Thursday. Their families called on the public to 'wake up' and fight to save the others before it's too late

Title: Signs of life from underground: 24 living hostages remain in Gaza...
Description: Thirty-five of the hostages held by Hamas in Gaza have been declared dead. Signs of life have been received from most of the remaining 24 men. What do we know about how they were abducted, about their conditions in captivity, and who is waiting for them at home?

Description: The Kalfon family initially kept a low profile after Segev was abducted from the Nova rave, to avoid harming the efforts to free him. 'I always believed that he is alive. It strengthened all of us to know that they had seen him,' his friend said after a first sign of life from him was received

Title: How the Gaza war broke Israel's taboo on contact with the far-rig...
Description: Israel's government has boycotted the Sweden Democrats since the party's founding by neo-Nazis in 1988. The political repercussions of the Gaza war has led to a new Israeli directive calling for exploratory talks, but the Swedish Jewish community still refuses all contact with the far-right party

Title: These are the four slain Israeli hostages whose bodies were retur...
Description: Itzhak Elgarat's brother, Danny, led the protest movement to release the hostages ■ Tsachi Idan's house in Nahal Oz became a Hamas compound on October 7 ■ Ohad Yahalomi was abducted with his 13-year-old son, Eitan, who returned in the first cease-fire deal ■ Shlomo Mantzur was the oldest hostage taken by Hamas

Title: Dozens of Arab Israeli crime family members arrested by Israel Po...
Description: About 1,000 Israel Police officers raided the homes of members of the Abu Latif crime family in northern Israel, confiscating cash and luxury vehicles. The suspects face charges relating to extortion, armed threats and shootings

Title: Iran ramps up production of near weapons-grade uranium, IAEA says...
Description: The IAEA chief says that the amount of uranium enriched by Iran is enough to make 'several' nuclear bombs. U.S. intelligence agencies assess that Iran has yet to begin a weapons program, but has 'undertaken activities that better position it to produce a nuclear device, if it chooses to do so.'

Title: Iran ramps up production of near weapons-grade uranium, IAEA says...
Description: The IAEA chief says that the amount of uranium enriched by Iran is enough to make 'several' nuclear bombs. U.S. intelligence agencies assess that Iran has yet to begin a weapons program, but has 'undertaken activities that better position it to produce a nuclear device, if it chooses to do so.'

Title: The Netanyahu-Trump bromance: How long till Israel's PM ends up i...
Description: Netanyahu's visit to Washington turned out to be more positive than he could ever have imagined, winning a blank check and an unshakable ally. But how long will it last?

Title: Head of intelligence unit slams IDF chief, says Oct. 7 wasn't inv...
Description: Top IDF officers 'didn't even dare to sit together for 15 minutes' and 'ask what happened,' the commander of the army's elite 8200 unit was quoted saying of the army's investigation into Hamas' attack

Description: A total of 41 people in Israel's Arab community have been murdered since the start of the year, compared to 27 during the same period last year, according to a Haaretz tally

Description: The charges against the Sydney nurse come as Australia experiences a surge in antisemitism that has roiled the nation as homes, businesses, synagogues and schools have been vandalized or torched in crimes targeting Jews

Title: Trump shares his AI vision of Gaza's future, with belly dancers, ...

Title: Match announcer for Arab-Israeli soccer team arrested after prais...

Title: Israeli filmmaker Renen Schorr, founder of Jerusalem's Sam Spiege...
Description: Schorr, the founding director of the Sam Spiegel Film and Television School in Jerusalem, played a key role in shaping Israel's film industry and building the school's international reputation. In 2024, he was honored with the Israeli Culture and Sports Ministry's Lifetime Achievement Award

Title: Jews less likely to believe in God than any religious group in Am...
Description: According to the latest Religious Landscape Study, conducted by the Pew Research Center, Jews are more likely to be intermarried and to support abortion and gay rights than most other Americans. After Hindus, they earn more money than members of any other religious group

Title: We have no control over when Alon will return and how he'll retu...
Description: Nothing was known about Alon Ohel's fate until the latest group of hostages was released over the past several weeks. His younger brother, Ronen, says Alon's captivity is always with him. 'It's like the sun. You can't look at it all the time because it's blinding. But it's always there'

Title: Rescued Israeli hostage Noa Argamani tells UN Security Council ho...
Description: Argamani spoke at the United Nations in New York and called for the cease-fire/hostage release deal to be implemented 'to end this tragedy'

Title: Arab Israeli standup comedian released from custody after telling...
Description: The police canceled two shows by Nidal Badarny, who had posted jokes online about hostages who had returned to Israel. Badarny said the cancellation was due to an 'incitement campaign against me by extremist racist groups'

Title: Witness tampering probe against Israeli prime minister's wife sta...
Description: Channel 12's 'Uvda' program broadcast a segment in December alleging that Sara Netanyahu exchanged text messages with her husband's office manager asking that the employee take action against a witness in the prime minister's corruption trial, but the show's management refuses to provide its raw material, saying it could compromise its source

Title: Israel's state prosecutor slams police over raid on East Jerusale...

Title: 16 months after Oct. 7: Gaza border communities set to receive an...

Title: Oded Lifshitz, murdered in Gaza captivity, laid to rest in Nir Oz...

Title: An outpost and IDF road block Palestinian farmers from their land...
Description: Palestinians in Bardala, who depend on their crops, say settlers are blocking the path to fields and waving guns near the village's homes. 'We can't work inside Israel, and then they bring a settler to my only piece of land. It'll cause people to resort to extremes,' a farmer says

Title: Germany's Merz assures Netanyahu can visit country and not be arr...

Title: Seeing Evyatar and Guy together is hugely powerful in this night...
Description: For one family, seeing their loved one, who has been held captive in Gaza for 507 days being forced by Hamas to watch the release of other hostages on Saturday, was the first sign of life that they had received from him since October 7. 'There has to be a continuation of the deal', his cousin said.

Description: GAZA: Hamas will not hold talks with Israel through mediators unless Palestinian prisoners are released as agreed, group official says ■ WEST BANK: 40,000 Palestinians 'evacuated' from refugee camps, tanks deployed in Jenin for first time since 2002 ■ LEBANON: Israeli strikes amidst funeral of Hezbollah leader Hassan Nasrallah; Lebanese president: 'We are tired of other people's wars', Lebanon supports two-state solution

Title: Israel's High court gives government three more months to submit ...
Description: The court's decision postpones the government's deadline for holding discussions on the establishment of a state commission of inquiry into the events of October 7, 2023. The court already decreed that the decision to establish such a committee is in the hands of the coalition alone

Title: Thousands rally in New York urging second stage of hostage deal
Description: Held in New York City's Central Park, the rally was attended by families of hostages, members of Congress, municipal councilors and Jewish community leaders as well as a blend of American Jews from the New York area and a significant number of Israelis

Title: Thousands rally in New York urging second stage of hostage deal
Description: Held in New York City's Central Park, the rally was attended by families of hostages, members of Congress, municipal councilors and Jewish community leaders as well as a blend of American Jews from the New York area and a significant number of Israelis

Title: Hostages' families share loved ones' stories amid return: 'emotio...
Description: Omer Wenkert's parents say he lost around 65 pounds, Hisham al-Sayed 'cannot speak'. In a joint press conference Sunday, the hostages' families shared the horrors their loves ones went through and called for the return of all remaining hostages

Title: Netanyahu demands Syrian army stay away from Israel's borders and...
Description: During an address to graduates of an IDF officers course, Netanyahu also raised a picture of Shiri Bibas and her two young children, Kfir and Ariel and spoke about Israel's commitment to the hostages, to which someone from the crowd shouted 'so why didn't you bring them back?'

Title: The real winners of Germany's elections? The far right – and Isra...
Description: While the world's attention will be on the shock of a fifth of Germans supporting the far-right AfD, the Netanyahu government's focus will be on who they'll be doing business with: the center-right Christian Democrats

Title: Israeli lawmaker accuses Yair Netanyahu of being exiled to Miami ...
Description: During a Knesset panel, Labor MK Naama Lazimi questioned the government's intention to continue funding Yair Netanyahu's extended U.S. stay 'because he assaulted the prime minister ... desecrating a symbol of state authority?' Netanyahu's Likud party: 'an absolute, repugnant lie'

Title: U.S. envoy Witkoff, about to visit Mideast for cease-fire talks, ...
Description: Witkoff expressed cautious optimism over the deal's continuity, revealing that he will be visiting Israel and Arab states including Egypt, Saudi Arabia and Qatar later this week. He repeated that 'the devil is in the details' of these upcoming negotiations

Title: U.S. envoy Witkoff, about to visit Mideast for cease-fire talks, ...
Description: Witkoff expressed cautious optimism over the deal's continuity, revealing that he will be visiting Israel and Arab states including Egypt, Saudi Arabia and Qatar later this week. He repeated that 'the devil is in the details' of these upcoming negotiations

Title: California schools to revise ethnic studies curriculum over alleg...
Description: A lawsuit by major Jewish organizations claims the district bypassed California laws on community input to approve 'dangerously anti-Jewish teachings' ■ Critics say the suit is an attempt to 'erase all legitimate criticism of Israel'

Title: I remember what it feels like to have your children there. This ...
Description: Renana Gomeh-Yaakov's two children were released from Gaza in November, 2023. A year ago, the family was told their father was likely killed on October 7, and his body is held by Hamas. 'If it was up to him, he would have said forget it, let it go – but bringing home the bodies is incredibly important'

Title: No clear resolution on Gaza's future after Saudi-led Arab leaders...
Description: Despite agreement to oppose Trump's Gaza transfer plan, Arab leaders are still divided over managing and reconstructing Gaza. 'A Gaza Strip under Hamas control is a red line for Israel and some Arab countries,' one source said

Title: Syrians hope low-cost airline Wizz Air will ease isolation with f...
Description: When Wizz Air's managing director told a UAE newspaper that 'we will be moving into Syria at some point,' Syrians anticipated an economic boost that could ease refugees' return and the reunification of families. Meanwhile, most major airlines still deem Syrian airspace too dangerous to enter

Title: Life in Gaza since the cease-fire: destruction everywhere – and H...
Description: Gazans realize that even though the shellings and bombings are over, the war for survival continues in line for water, and in tents that won't shield against freezing temperatures. They must also deal with Hamas

Title: Germany's far right feels triumphant, even without taking power a...
Description: The AfD is steadily gaining ground in Germany's political establishment. One of its leaders told Haaretz that concerns over the party's antisemitic undertones were mistaken, warning that Jews are threatened only by Muslim immigrants: 'We have to stop this flow into our country, specifically to protect Jews'

Title: Israel says 40,000 Palestinians 'evacuated' West Bank refugee cam...
Description: Israeli Defense Minister Katz said he ordered the army to remain in West Bank refugee camps for a year and prevent residents from returning, deploying tanks to the area for the first time in over 20 years

Title: He can't be dead, he's alive': Children of Nir Oz struggle with ...
Description: At a memorial rally for their murdered neighbors, a mother from Nir Oz shared that her son – best friend of Ariel Bibas – suggested, 'The terrorists are struggling to let go of him because he's funny and they love him.' When he was announced dead, the questions began: 'Why did he die – and how?'

Title: Thousands gather for Beirut funeral of Hezbollah leader Nasrallah...
Description: Nasrallah was killed when Israel dropped over 80 bombs on Hezbollah's main operations room. The group is urging supporters to attend his funeral to demonstrate its strength

Title: Netanyahu may exploit latest Israel-Hamas hostage crisis to nix c...
Description: As vengeance over the Bibas family's fate reaches an intensity in Israel not seen since October 7, Netanyahu seeks alternative Gaza cease-fire routes to delay the political challenge of freeing hundreds more Palestinian prisoners

Title: As Netanyahu considers escalating the Gaza cease-fire crisis, Isr...

Title: French foreign minister slams far-right leader for meeting Israel...
Description: The French foreign minister rebuked National Rally Jordan Bardella leader for meeting Israeli Minister Amichai Chikli, who recently condemned France's 'insolence' and called to shut down the country's Jerusalem consulate. Chikli triggered a diplomatic crisis last year when he endorsed the far-right party before France's elections

Title: French foreign minister slams far-right leader for meeting Israel...
Description: The French foreign minister rebuked National Rally Jordan Bardella leader for meeting Israeli Minister Amichai Chikli, who recently condemned France's 'insolence' and called to shut down the country's Jerusalem consulate. Chikli triggered a diplomatic crisis last year when he endorsed the far-right party before France's elections

Title: French FM hits far-right leader for meeting Israeli minister who ...
Description: The French foreign minister rebuked far-right National Rally leader for meeting Israeli Minister Amichai Chikli, who called to shut down the French consulate in Jerusalem and faced criticism in both France and Israel for supporting the party in France's last elections

Title: French FM blasts far-right leader for meeting Israeli minister wh...
Description: The French foreign minister condemned the far-right National Rally leader for meeting Israel's Amichai Chikli, who previously sparked criticism in both France and Israel by publicly supporting the party in France's last elections

Title: Netanyahu delays Palestinian prisoner release as Israel, Hamas tr...
Description: The release of the six hostages on Saturday largely marks the end of the first stage of the cease-fire deal; Israeli leaders are weighing whether to extending the truce for more hostage releases, advancing the deal under U.S. pressure, or resuming IDF fighting in Gaza

Title: Netanyahu's office: Release of Palestinian prisoners delayed over...
Description: The families of 602 Palestinian prisoners had been informed that their release would take place on Saturday evening. Israel's Prison Service said they would be released with bracelets inscribed, 'The eternal people does not forget'

Title: Two Israeli hostages brought to watch release ceremony in Gaza, H...
Description: Hostages Guy Gilboa Dallal and Evyatar David can be seen pleading with the Israeli PM to secure their release from Gaza: 'Netanyahu, our friends are going home after 500 days together. We beg you, please, this is all we want, save us'

Title: Freed hostage Eli Sharabi's niece: 'We're focusing on the fact th...
Description: Since her uncles Eli and Yossi Sharabi were abducted to Gaza, 15-year-old Adi has fought for their release. Eli was freed this month, but Yossi remains in Hamas captivity: 'I will continue this struggle until the last hostage returns'

Title: Shackles, total darkness, isolation: Freed hostages describe capt...
Description: Omer Shem Tov's father told Israeli media that his son's captors spat and insulted him. He recounted that early in the war, Omer saw a speech by Netanyahu vowing to destroy Hamas without mentioning the hostages – which had deeply affected him

Title: Freedom, it's crazy!': Hostages reunite with families in Israel ...
Description: Omer Shem Tov reunited with his parents, telling them, 'I've dreamed of this moment so many times' ■ Omer Wenkert mother told him, 'You're a winner' ■ Tal Shoham reunited with his wife and children, who were abducted with him to Gaza and released in November 2023 ■ Eliya Cohen, upon seeing his parents, said, 'No more tears'

Title: Syrian suspect in Berlin Holocaust Memorial stabbing wanted to ki...
Description: The 19-year-old suspect stabbed a 30-year-old Spanish tourist, leaving him seriously wounded. Local authorities suggested a connection to the Israel-Hamas war, as Germany's interior minister stated, 'We will use all available means to deport violent criminals back to Syria'

Title: We can bring them all home,' says father of newly released hosta...
Description: Sasha Troufanov, released last week from Hamas captivity, attended a rally in Tel Aviv ■ Members of Kibbutz Nir Oz are holding a memorial for Oded Lifshitz and the Bibas family ■ Arye Zalmanovitch's son, whose father's body is held by Hamas, condemned revenge calls in Israel: 'Will revenge bring my father back? Are we to become like those barbaric cowards?'

Description: Sasha Troufanov, released last week from Hamas captivity, attended a rally in Tel Aviv ■ Members of Kibbutz Nir Oz are holding a memorial for Oded Lifshitz and the Bibas family ■ Arye Zalmanovitch's son, whose father's body is held by Hamas, condemned revenge calls in Israel: 'Will revenge bring my father back? Are we to become like those barbaric cowards?'

Title: Families demand release of next stage hostages 'all at once' as I...
Description: Sasha Troufanov, who was released from captivity last week, will address protesters at Hostage Square. Demonstrations will also take place across major Israeli cities. Kibbutz Nir Oz will hold a memorial for Oded Lifshitz and the Bibas family in southern Israel

Title: From anxiety to ecstasy: Families and friends rejoice as hostages...
Description: After seeing him step out of the Hamas jeep, I can finally breathe,' said a friend of Tal Shoham. A friend of Abera Mengistu, back after a decade in Gaza, admitted, 'The first thing I'll say is 'sorry' for taking so long.' Omer Shem Tov's father said, 'Our personal mission is complete, but the national mission is far from over – we must bring everyone home'

Title: Trump should listen to the Bibas family, not to Bibi Netanyahu
Description: While the Bibas family urges the government to prioritize the release of remaining hostages, Netanyahu uses their suffering to push for war - putting Israelis still in captivity at even greater risk

Title: 602 Palestinian prisoners to be released on Saturday, mostly Gaza...
Description: 108 of the prisoners to be released are serving long prison sentences, most of them life sentences for attack and murders of Israelis; 444 prisoners, however, are Gazans who were arrested during the war and classified as 'not involved in combat'

Title: Six Israeli hostages released from Hamas captivity, two of them a...
Description: Hostages Hisham al-Sayed and Abera Mengistu were released after nearly a decade in Gaza, while Eliya Cohen, Tal Shoham, Omer Shem Tov and Omer Wenkert were released after 505 days in Hamas captivity

Title: Body of hostage Shiri Bibas, murdered in Gaza captivity, handed o...
Description: We received the news we had feared this morning,' the Bibas family said. 'Today, after 16 unbearably difficult months, the painful circle is finally closed for the family,' Kibbutz Nir Oz, where she lived, said in a statement

Title: Welcome to Israel. Try to survive
Description: What worries the tens of thousands of new immigrants who arrived in Israel in the past year, despite the war, is less the security situation than finding work and the high cost of living. They have less time to learn Hebrew – and the language barrier hampers their integration

Title: It's routine by now: Israeli troops burst in, humiliate a Palesti...
Description: It happens all the time in hundreds of West Bank homes, but more intensively during the war. IDF soldiers with dogs burst in. Chaos reigns: beatings, shouts, curses, humiliation, gunfire – and sometimes even an abduction

Title: It's routine by now: Israeli troops burst in, humiliate a Palesti...
Description: It happens all the time in hundreds of West Bank homes, but more intensively during the war. IDF soldiers with dogs burst in. Chaos reigns: beatings, shouts, curses, humiliation, gunfire – and sometimes even an abduction

Title: How the Netanyahu government pushed back against the High Court t...
Description: The government's allegation that a 2018 High Court ruling foiled the struggle against Hamas is abject hypocrisy

Title: What does Netanyahu mean when he vows to 'resume the war' in Gaza...

Title: These are the six Israeli hostages set to be released from Hamas ...

Title: Work on Arrow 3 missile defense system starts in Germany, to be o...
Description: The Israeli-built Arrow 3 systems are intended to fill a gap in Germany's air defenses. 'Full operational readiness of the entire system is expected to be achieved by 2030,' he added

Title: After weeks of relief and hope, grief sweeps over Tel Aviv's Host...

Title: Bodies of four hostages killed during Gaza captivity returned to ...
Description: The four hostages were kidnapped from Kibbutz Nir Oz on October 7, 2023, and were held by Hamas since. 'I bow my head and ask for forgiveness. Forgiveness for not protecting you on that terrible day,' said Israel's Israel's president, Isaac Herzog

Title: Israeli theater cancels lecture over speaker's support for sancti...
Description: Yagil Levy, a leading Israeli scholar of military-civilian relations, was invited to speak in southern Israel. After it was discovered that he had signed a petition to cut support for Israel, the host venue scrapped the event, stating they preferred not to host anything 'controversial'

Title: Israeli journalist, screenwriter, and Haaretz columnist B. Michae...
Description: Michael Brizon, known as B. Michael, penned opinion pieces for Haaretz for two decades. 'He was devoted to his writing, a rare trait in Israeli journalism. If he wrote something, it had to be exactly as he intended, without concessions,' said a fellow writer and satirist

Title: Cold wave 'Coral' won't bring significant snowfall, Israel's mete...
Description: The storm is set to bring freezing temperatures to the region over the weekend, but heavy snowfall is expected only on Mount Hermon, Israel's highest peak in the northern Golan Heights

Title: For over a year, Israeli authorities ignored settlers' attacks. T...
Description: After a year and a half of violence from Israeli settlers in a nearby outpost, Ahmed and Anwar Trawa – together with their five children and other Palestinian families – were last weekend expelled from their homes in the West Bank. Settlers later on set their homes on fire

Title: For over a year, Israeli authorities ignored settlers' attacks. T...
Description: After a year and a half of violence from Israeli settlers in a nearby outpost, Ahmed and Anwar Trawa – together with their five children and other Palestinian families – were last weekend expelled from their homes in the West Bank. Settlers later on set their homes on fire

Title: As Israel faces its darkest days, Netanyahu sidelines security ch...
Description: A bizarre statement from Netanyahu's office targeting the heads of Mossad and Shin Bet strongly suggests a state of anxiety and loss of control – all rooted in Netanyahu's political fears at the cost of returning the hostages and progressing to the next stage of the cease-fire

Title: The Israeli 'official' with a thousand faces makes PM's next targ...
Description: The statement from Netanyahu's office on Wednesday morning was bizarre even for the Bibi-ist camp and strongly suggests a state of anxiety, mental instability and loss of control – all of which are rooted in Qatar-gate, the second stage of the cease-fire that threatens to topple his government, his problems passing a Haredi draft-dodging law and in rapidly approaching deadline for approving the budget

Title: I know my turn will come': Murders are a routine reality for Ara...
Description: Since the beginning of the year, 35 people have been murdered in the Arab community, six of them in Lod, a mixed-Arab Jewish city in central Israel. 'Every time there's a murder in the city, I check to see if it's a relative of mine,' a resident said

Title: Israeli forensic institute prepares to receive bodies of hostages...
Description: We'll do everything we can to give them definitive answers in the shortest possible time': Israel's health establishment is preparing to identify the bodies of hostages being returned from Gaza – and determine the circumstances of their deaths
